name: Aztec Temple Quest
description:
Match and swap your way through more than 300 levels as you help Joanna find her way to the secret temple. Aztec Temple Quest is a colourful and fun puzzle adventure that takes you through jungles, rainforests and marshes filled with gems and jewels.

● 300+ match-3 puzzles to solve, full of hidden dangers and challenges.

● Embark on a journey in “Story Mode” to assist Joanna on her legendary Aztec Temple Quest.

● No limited lives, moves or blockages; simply endless match-3 fun!

● Beat high-scores and dive straight into the match 3 action with “Classic Mode”.

● Make smart moves to awaken ancient gods and unleash their powers.

● Lots of fun and fresh new twists to the classic match 3 genre.

● Line up the perfect chain reactions for maximum points!
